about_the_game: Stop and speed up time when you need it!
detailed_description: Stop and speed up time when you need it!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux OS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card 512MB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0 compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux OS
  • Processor: Intel i3 3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 or Radeon R7 200
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card 512MB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0 compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Intel i3 3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 or Radeon R7 200
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible card

name: First Day - Time Control

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card 512MB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel i3 3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 or Radeon R7 200
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible card

supported_languages:
English, Russian*, French, German, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
